description: Mapping of SDLC deliverables to specialized AI agent skills to ensure high-quality project planning and execution.

phases.goal: Identify business needs and user requirements.

documents.name: Functional Requirements
documents.description: Detailed description of system features and capabilities.

documents.name: Non-Functional Requirements
documents.description: Operational constraints like performance, security, and scalability.

documents.name: User Stories & PRD
documents.description: Feature descriptions from user perspective with acceptance criteria.

documents.name: RACI Matrix
documents.description: Stakeholder responsibility assignment matrix.

documents.name: Risk Register
documents.description: Identified risks with probability, impact, and mitigation plans.

phases.goal: Design the user interface and experience.

documents.name: User Flow & Wireframes
documents.description: Visual path of the user through the application and basic layout.

documents.name: High-Fidelity Mockups
documents.description: Detailed visual design of the application screens.

documents.name: Design System / Style Guide
documents.description: Consistent UI components, colors, and typography rules.

phases.goal: Visualize system behavior and high-level structure.

documents.name: Use Case Diagram
documents.description: Representation of user interactions with system components.

documents.name: Activity Diagram
documents.description: Flow of business logic or system processes.

documents.name: System Architecture Diagram
documents.description: Structural layout of the tech stack and component communication.

phases.goal: Define low-level technical specifications for implementation.

documents.name: Class Diagram
documents.description: Static structure showing classes, attributes, methods, and relationships.

documents.name: Sequence Diagram
documents.description: Time-ordered interaction between objects/components.

documents.name: API Specification (OpenAPI)
documents.description: The contract between frontend and backend services.

phases.goal: Design data structures and plan project timeline.

documents.name: Data Dictionary
documents.description: Comprehensive reference of all data entities, fields, types, and constraints.

documents.name: Entity Relationship Diagram (ERD)
documents.description: Visual representation of all entities and their relationships.

documents.name: Data Migration Plan
documents.description: Strategy for database schema versioning, migration, and rollback.

documents.name: Project Estimation
documents.description: Story points, sprint planning, resource allocation, and risk buffer.

phases.goal: Ensure reliability and protection of the system.

documents.name: Test Plan & Automation Strategy
documents.description: Defining how the system will be verified and validated.

documents.name: Performance Testing Plan
documents.description: Load and stress testing strategy with k6/Artillery.

documents.name: Accessibility Testing
documents.description: WCAG 2.1 AA compliance verification checklist.

documents.name: Security Threat Modeling
documents.description: Identifying potential security risks and mitigation plans.

phases.goal: Plan data storage and physical environment.

documents.name: Database Schema (ERD)
documents.description: Logical and physical database structure and relationships.

documents.name: Deployment Diagram
documents.description: Physical hosting infrastructure and network configuration.

documents.name: CI/CD Pipeline Workflow
documents.description: Automated build, test, and deployment process.

phases.goal: Monitor, maintain, and update the live system.

documents.name: Monitoring & Alerting Setup
documents.description: System health tracking, logging, and incident response plan.

documents.name: User & Technical Documentation
documents.description: Manuals for end-users and onboarding guides for developers.

phases.goal: Transition project to client or operations team.

documents.name: Handoff Checklist
documents.description: Comprehensive checklist ensuring nothing is missed during transition.

documents.name: Knowledge Transfer Plan
documents.description: Structured plan for transferring project knowledge to receiving team.

documents.name: Acceptance & Sign-off
documents.description: Formal document for stakeholder acceptance of delivered project.

documents.name: Post-Launch Review
documents.description: Retrospective analysis with lessons learned and improvement items.
